title: Exquisite Peacock Nakshi Haaram with Polki Diamonds
features: Traditional peacock design (Mayura Nakshi) pendant, intricate Polki diamond setting in an open network pattern. Featuring an emerald stone at the top and peacocks as the main subject. Ruby and Emerald stones embellish the peacocks with pearls as drops. The metal frame is gold plated.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham and Half-Saree functions.
description: This Haaram showcases the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship, blending traditional motifs with the brilliance of Polki diamonds. The Peacock design symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and royalty. The intricate setting is a testament to our artisans' skill, ensuring a timeless piece that can be passed down through generations. A statement piece that perfectly balances tradition and contemporary style.
